name: The 4th Laser and Optoelectronics Conference
content: The 4th Laser and Optoelectronics Conference (LOC 2018) will be held from December 1-3, 2018 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Laser and Optoelectronics. LOC 2018 dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. Prof. W. J.
